response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its immense value to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will not only acquire a high-quality product but also enjoy exclusive benefits and support tailored to your needs. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
